subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: The teenage golf star Lydia Ko has split with the only coach she has had since she took up the sport as a 5-year-old. The coach, Guy Wilson, has worked with Ko for 11 years.
snippet: The teenage golf star Lydia Ko has split with the only coach she has had since she took up the sport as a 5-year-old. The coach, Guy Wilson, has worked with Ko for 11 years.
